thread.title: Air India, SpiceJet give massive discounts on tickets; price starts at Rs 777
thread.title_full: Air India, SpiceJet give massive discounts on tickets; price starts at Rs 777

title: Air India, SpiceJet give massive discounts on tickets; price starts at Rs 777
text:
Air India, SpiceJet give massive discounts on tickets; price starts at Rs 777 Last Updated: Wednesday, February 22, 2017 - 21:44 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Air India and SpiceJet on Wednesday came out with offers, including free tickets, to attract more fliers as the airlines look to increase seat occupancy amid stiff competition. 
While Air India is giving one ticket free for every booking in First Class and Business Class, SpiceJet would be offering tickets priced as low as Rs 777 on select routes. 
Jet Airways offers assured additional JPMiles 

Under the 'Buy One Fly Two' offer, national carrier Air India would give one ticket free on First Class and Business Class on non-metro routes in the domestic sector. 
Here are Air India deal details 
Sale Period: From 20th February 2017 till 31st May, 2017. (both days inclusive). 
Travel Period: From 20th February 2017 till 31st May, 2017. (both days inclusive). Return Travel to be completed during this period 
Announcing 'Lucky 7 Sale', budget airline SpiceJet said it would offer "all inclusive one-way fares as low as Rs 777 for travel to select destinations on its domestic network". 
The Rs 777 all inclusive fare is valid on various routes including Jammu-Srinagar and Agartala-Guwahati. 
Here are Spicejet sale Details 
Sale Period: February 22 to February 25 
Travel Period: March 9 to March 13
